title: Politicke, moral, and martial discourses. Written in French by M. Iaques Hurault, lord of Vieul and of Marais, and one of the French kings priuie Councell. Dedicated by the author to the French-kings Maiestie: and translated into English by Arthur Golding
author: Hurault, Jacques.
notes: Translation of: Trois livres des offices d'estat.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
